about.title: About Me

my_articles_mock.title: A First Look at Transitioning from Xamarin Native to Flutter
my_articles_mock.description: In this article, I want to share my experience of transitioning from Xamarin Native to Flutter. I will compare the two frameworks based on my personal experience, discuss my previous misconceptions about declarative frameworks that were dispelled through working with Flutter, and finally, I will reflect on my ideal dream mobile framework.

project2.title: Tabalonia
project2.description: A library for creating tabbed interfaces like those in browsers

project3.title: X-Filer
project3.description: File manager with a tabbed interface, similar to Google Chrome

project4.title: X-Filer Plus
project4.description: Cross-platform file manager with a tabbed interface, similar to Google Chrome for Windows and MacOS
